author: Daniel Brettig
title: Bank demands force savage Cricket Australia salary cuts
description: Majority of staff to be stood down on 20% of pay until July; executives and a skeletal staff on 80% of their salaries | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: Savage 80% salary cuts and stand-down orders for all but a handful of Cricket Australia staff until the end of the financial year were forced partly by demands from banks, for the governing body to drastically scale back its costs in order to be considered fo… [+4696 chars]
